articles.title: NASA Awards Contract to Launch Initial Elements for Lunar Outpost - NASA
articles.description: NASA has selected Space Exploration Technologies (SpaceX) of Hawthorne, California, to provide launch services for the agency’s Power and Propulsion Element (PPE) and Habitation and Logistics Outpost (HALO), the foundational elements of the Gateway.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Martian moon Phobos could tell us what Mars was like in the past - CNN
articles.description: Phobos, one of the Martian moons, may actually hold key information about what Mars was like in the past, according to new research, because it was right in the path of the Martian atmosphere as it escaped out into space.
